de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data

Interface SparseNumberVector<V extends SparseNumberVector<V,N>,N extends Number>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Vector type number type
    N - Number type
    All Superinterfaces:
    FeatureVector<V,N>, InspectionUtilFrequentlyScanned, NumberVector<V,N>, Parameterizable, SparseFeatureVector<V,N>, SpatialComparable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SparseDoubleVector, SparseFloatVector

    public interface SparseNumberVector<V extends SparseNumberVector<V,N>,N extends Number>
extends NumberVector<V,N>, SparseFeatureVector<V,N>
    Combines the SparseFeatureVector and NumberVector
